thread.title: Fed Official Who Bailed Out Big Banks Is Now One of Their Biggest Critics - WSJ

author: Alison Sider
title: Fed Official Who Bailed Out Big Banks Is Now One of Their Biggest Critics - WSJ
text:
A decade after the financial crisis, The Wall Street Journal has checked in on dozens of the bankers, government officials, chief executives, hedge-fund managers and others who left a mark on that period to find out what they are doing now. Today, we spotlight former Treasury Department administrator Neel Kashkari and hedge-fund managerKyle Bass.
Neel Kashkari oversaw the bailout of big banks during the financial crisis. Now, as a Federal Reserve regional bank president, he is proposing measures that could break them up.
...
